alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys; Frank Church Wilderness; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 19 at 1:32PM MDT until August 21 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall from the remnants of Tropical Storm Hilary continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of central Idaho, including the following areas, Big Lost Highlands/Copper Basin, Challis/Pahsimeroi Valleys, Frank Church Wilderness, Lost River Range, Lost River Valley, Sawtooth/Stanley Basin, Sun Valley Region and Wood River Foothills. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations, particularly downstream of any recent wildfires. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Flooding may occur in areas with poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. Extensive street flooding and flooding of creeks and rivers are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Very deep atmospheric moisture associated with remnants of Hurricane Hilary are forecast to impact the Central Idaho Mountains Sunday through Monday. Prolonged periods of moderate rainfall are expected both days, with enhanced rainfall rates due to embedded thunderstorms. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
